text: install LCZ4r use development version latest features ```{r setup, include=TRUE} devtools::install_github(“ByMaxAnjos/LCZ4r”) library(LCZ4r)  nice function gets LCZ parameters (including, min, max, mean) Stewart Oke (2012) converts shapefile raster stack. ```{r setup, include=TRUE} LCZpar <- getLCZparameters(lcz_map, iStack = TRUE)
code: ## Overview of the package The **LCZ4r** package includes 5 functions: - `getLCZmap()` - Get you LCZ map - `plotLCZmap()` - Plot you LCZ map - `LCZarea()` - Caculate the LCZ area - `getLCZparameters()` - Get LCZ parameters - `plotLCZparameters()` - Plot LCZ parameters ## Basic Usage This function gets LCZ for a specified region of interest (ROI) using global LCZ mapping. ```{r setup, include=TRUE} lcz_map <- getLCZmap(city="Berlin") plotLCZmap(lcz_map) This function calculates the LCZ area like this: ```{r setup, include=TRUE} LCZarea <- LCZarea(lcz_map, iplot = TRUE) LCZarea

what: Get LCZ Parameters from LCZ Stewart and Oke (2012) — getLCZparameters
title: Get LCZ Parameters from LCZ Stewart and Oke (2012) — getLCZparameters
text: function extracts 34 Local Climate Zone (LCZ) parameters based classification scheme developed Stewart Oke (2012). LCZs provide valuable information urban morphology useful urban climate environmental studies.

title: Get LCZ Parameters from LCZ Stewart and Oke (2012) — getLCZparameters
code: getLCZparameters(x, iSelect = NULL, iStack = TRUE, iShp = FALSE, isave = FALSE)

title: Get LCZ Parameters from LCZ Stewart and Oke (2012) — getLCZparameters
text: x LCZ map .tiff format SpatRaster object containing LCZ classes. iSelect Character vector. Specify one parameter names retrieve specific parameters. example, "SVF.min" get minimum Sky View Factor, c("SVF.min", "veg.frac.max") select multiple parameters. iStack Logical. TRUE, returns parameters raster stack. FALSE, returns list individual parameter rasters. iShp Logical. TRUE, returns parameters ESRI shapefile. isave Set TRUE want save clipped resulting map raster.tiff .shp file local machine.

title: Get LCZ Parameters from LCZ Stewart and Oke (2012) — getLCZparameters
text: 'iStack' TRUE, returns raster stack containing 34 LCZ-related parameters.         'iStack' FALSE, returns list individual parameter rasters.         'iShp' TRUE, returns ESRI shapefile containing parameters.         'iSelect' specified, returns selected parameter(s) raster(s).

title: Get LCZ Parameters from LCZ Stewart and Oke (2012) — getLCZparameters
code: # Load the LCZ map #lcz_map <- raster::raster("path/to/lcz_map.tif")  # Get LCZ parameters as a raster stack #lcz_params_stack <- getLCZparameters(lcz_map, iStack = TRUE)  # Get LCZ parameters as a list of individual parameter rasters #lcz_params_list <- getLCZparameters(lcz_map, iStack = FALSE)  # Access individual parameters from the list #specific_param <- lcz_params_list$parameter_name  # Plot a specific parameter #plot(specific_param, main = "LCZ Parameter: Parameter Name")  # Get specific parameters as a raster or shapefile #selected_params <- getLCZparameters(lcz_map, iSelect = c("SVF.min", "veg.frac.max"), iShp = TRUE)
